steps.title: Obtain an HDB Flat Eligibility (HFE) Letter
details: Apply for an HFE letter on the My Flat Dashboard for an overview of housing and financing options.
This letter informs you of your eligibility to purchase a flat, CPF housing grants, and HDB housing loans.
You can request an In-Principle Approval (IPA) from financial institutions when applying for the HFE letter.

steps.title: Search for a Flat and Obtain an Option to Purchase (OTP)
details: Search for flats on the HDB Flat Portal or use a salesperson's service.
Obtain an OTP from the seller after agreeing on the price (the seller must have registered an Intent to Sell for at least 7 days).

steps.title: Confirm mode of financing
details: If using an HDB loan, ensure your HFE letter reflects this.
If using a financial institution loan, secure a Letter of Offer (LO) before exercising the OTP.
You may concurrently request an IPA and LO from financial institutions when applying for the HFE letter.

steps.title: Submit Request for Value
details: If paying with CPF savings and/or a loan, submit a Request for Value by the next working day after receiving the OTP.

steps.title: Convert In-Principle Approval (IPA) into a Letter of Offer (LO)
details: If an IPA was requested earlier, convert it into an LO before exercising the OTP during the Option Period.

steps.title: Submit resale application
details: Both buyer and seller must submit their respective portions of the resale application after the OTP is exercised.

steps.title: Acknowledge resale documents and pay fees
details: After HDB verifies the complete resale application, both parties must acknowledge and endorse the resale documents, which will be ready around 3 weeks after application acceptance.
Pay any required fees, including administrative costs and legal fees (if applicable).

steps.title: Get resale approval
details: Once documents are endorsed and fees paid, HDB will grant approval for the resale transaction.

steps.title: Attend completion appointment
details: The resale transaction is typically completed about 8 weeks after HDB accepts the resale application.
If you wish to defer the completion, discuss the new date with the seller and submit a written confirmation signed by both parties via MyRequest@HDB.
You will receive the appointment details via SMS and can also view them on HDB portal (My Flat Dashboard).
